name: Kaabil
review:
With more work on revenge script in the later part of the movie, this could have been a wonderfully made thriller. A great build up in first half with some decent direction and amazing acting by Hrithik Roshan, but mostly a disappointment towards the end. Overall, a nice concept and thought, which could've been so much better.

Storyline Rating: 3

Acting Rating: 4
Hrithik Roshan: 4
Yami Gautam: 3
Ronit Roy: 2
Rohit Roy: 2
Girish Kulkarni: 2
